research_municipality_step.notes: The position of Alderman - Public Relations is currently vacant with a term expiring 05/2026. Preston Armistead was nominated in May 2024 to serve the unexpired term of former Alderman Brad Dawson. While a special election for an unexpired Mayor term is scheduled for November 2025, the official city website's 'About' page lists Kendall McGilvray as the current Mayor with a term expiring in May 2026.
